ASAP 係勁無禮貌既用字, 一定唔會對客用. 通常新仔比老細用呢個字話用就有樣學樣 用黎催人交野 .

一般會用 Once available / When available

exp: Pls kindly advise the ETD once available.

再分享幾個 :

FOC = Free of charges.

ETD = Estimated time of departure

B4 = Before

TMR = Tomorrow

Pls = Please

Rgds = Regards

PI = Proforma Invoice

CI = Commercial Invoice

CN = Credit Note

DN = Debit Note

PL = Packing List

利申 : 年資7年 Merchandiser
